articles.title: Why the border deal happened: Republicans held Europe for ransom - POLITICO
articles.description: Europeans supporting aid to Ukraine get a brutal lesson in how American politics is hampering the transatlantic security relationship.
articles.content:
He was trying to draw parallels with Republican ideology, recalled Rep. Ken Buck of Colorado, who helped convene the meeting.
Then Rasmussen addressed his real agenda: a passionate appeal for aiding… [+6020 chars]
